captions.text:
The next game is
"Sign Language".

Anderson, Elidio and Gustavo
will play, please stand up.
Elidio will interview Anderson,

and he's a expert in a subject
that we'll decide later.

Meanwhile, Gustavo will
translate this interview
to his very own sign language.

I need an expertise, something
Anderson can be an expert of.

'Hairdresser'.
That's it.

So Anderson is a
'hairdressing expert'.

And the "Sign Language"
Game starts now.

All right, we're returning with
Hairs, Hairdos, Dyes & Co.!

We're here today with Beto Brando who
has a new line of hair dye, is that right?

I have a new line of dyes I have
brought from Paris. France...

France is a pioneer
in the hair dye segment.

For instance, I want
to dye my hair purple.

The best dye is found in Europe,
more precisely, in France.

Good. And for this kind of dye,
do you need oxigenated water?

Yes. The dyeing
may require a pot of...

A bottle of oxygenated
water for bleaching,

because from white
we go to the other colors.

- Right. - Back in the day,
we didn't use oxygenated water.

We used a kind of water
with a radioactive effect...

With a chemical product
we call  BRA-39.

- Right. - Nowadays,
BRA-39 is strictly forbidden.

Right. And about the dyeing, how
many different processes are there?

There are over 50 processes,
but there's two I like to use.

I hold the client's head and
dive it into a solution...
of three quarters of potable water and one quarter of oxygenated water.
- Repeat the quarters thing... - For those watching us at home,
three quarters of potable water...
For a quarter of oxygenated water!
Three quarters, come on...

The funny thing is that he understood
three labors, instead of quarters!
That's why he did this...

But I corrected myself
and did the three quarters.

That's why I asked him to repeat,
I wasn't understanding.

I saw him giving birth
and said 'wait'...

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
I'm a groin salesman!
